class.name: move_group/MoveGroupCartesianPathService
class.description: Computing straight line Cartesian paths with collision checking via a ROS service

class.name: move_group/MoveGroupExecuteService
class.description: Allow execution of previously computed paths via a ROS service

class.name: move_group/MoveGroupExecuteTrajectoryAction
class.description: Allow execution of previously computed trajectories via a ROS action

class.name: move_group/MoveGroupKinematicsService
class.description: Compute forward and inverse kinematics via ROS services

class.name: move_group/MoveGroupMoveAction
class.description: Compute motion plans via a ROS action

class.name: move_group/MoveGroupPlanService
class.description: Compute motion plans via a ROS service

class.name: move_group/MoveGroupQueryPlannersService
class.description: Allow querying of available planners (loaded from the motion planning plugin) via a ROS service

class.name: move_group/MoveGroupStateValidationService
class.description: Provide a ROS service that allows for testing state validity

class.name: move_group/MoveGroupGetPlanningSceneService
class.description: Provide a ROS service that allows for querying the planning scene

class.name: move_group/ApplyPlanningSceneService
class.description: Provide a ROS service for blocking updates to the planning scene

class.name: move_group/ClearOctomapService
class.description: Provide a ROS service that allows for clearing the octomap

class.name: move_group/TfPublisher
class.description: Provide a capability that publishes PlanningScene frames to the tf system
